fields.description:
{{ti sdk select}} shows the SDK options out of order, but {{ti sdk}} shows them correctly in order.

*Steps to reproduce issue*
1. Run {{appc ti sdk select}}

*Actual results*
The SDKs listed are out of order

*Expected results*
The SDKs listed are in order

*Notes*
May not be an issue for people not installing non-GA SDKs.

{code}
